body.name: Splash About Happy Nappy,Blue Cobalt, 12-24 Months
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
body.description: Reliable Leak Protection The best choice in reusable swim diaper Made from super-soft 1mm thick neoprene, the Happy Nappy is designed to be gentle on baby’s skin. With no tight elastic, it has been developed to move as your baby moves, so it won’t leave red marks or chafe the skin. The snug ribs around the waist and thighs are reliable in keeping in solids and preventing any accidents from leaking into the pool. Regularly voted the most comfortable swim nappy and with no poppers or Velcro, the Happy Nappy is the most secure, leak-proof swim nappy available. Unique patented design for the best protection against faecal leaks Recommended by Swim Schools Worldwide Multi Award Winning

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Happy Nappy Reusable Swim Diaper The multi-award winning Happy Nappy swim diaper provides the ultimate leak protection and is recommended by Swim Schools.

Our Planet At Splash About we are determined to save the planet one bottom at a time. The Happy Nappy is designed to be used with or without a disposable swim diaper, and we are aiming for all designs to be made from recycled plastic waste materials within the next year, ensuring we don’t add to environmental damage, but actively work to stop it. Reusable, recyclable and remarkable. The famous Happy Nappy. No need for disposable diapers Helps reduce your carbon footprint Reliable Leak Protection The best choice in reusable swim diaper Made from super-soft 1mm thick neoprene, the Happy Nappy is designed to be gentle on baby’s skin. With no tight elastic, it has been developed to move as your baby moves, so it won’t leave red marks or chafe the skin. The snug ribs around the waist and thighs are reliable in keeping in solids and preventing any accidents from leaking into the pool. Regularly voted the most comfortable swim nappy and with no poppers or Velcro, the Happy Nappy is the most secure, leak-proof swim nappy available. Unique patented design for the best protection against faecal leaks Recommended by Swim Schools Worldwide Multi Award Winning

Technically deigned for the best comfort and leak protection The Happy Nappy Swim Diaper has undergone rigorous testing to ensure it provides a leak free swim, every time. Snug waist and thigh ribs stop any solids leaving the diaper, whilst the soft neoprene moves with the baby to prevent any gaping. Our commitment to a leak-free swim, means that there hasn’t been a reported poo leak anywhere in the world from a Happy Nappy in over 6 years!

How to find the best fit for your baby For the best, most secure fit, we recommend measuring your baby whilst they are laid down, in minimal clothing and not immediately after a feed. Measure the tummy across the belly button and around the fullest part of the thigh.Please then refer to our size guide to find the recommended size. Please bear in mind, the Happy Nappy must fit snugly around the thighs and waist, to form a seal that will prevent leaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Never been into swim diapers and this is 100% the solution! The fabric holds any accident in, and they are much more comfortable for the babies/toddlers to wear! Totally recommend and will continue to purchase in future

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great swim diaper and hold up well in wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Love this little bathing suit ! Super adorable and works great when combined with liner or disposable swim diaper. Tight - though this may be the point

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds in #2 accidents great!
reviews.reviewText: This item over a disposable swim diaper has kept all number 2 accidents out of the pool during my sons swim lessons. I haven’t tried it without a disposable swim diaper under yet since he it hasn’t gotten warm enough in our home pool - don’t want to risk ruining swim classes for everyone for a day. The waist and legs are pretty snug on this so I think it would be fine on its own. My son is 13 months old, 22lbs and 31” tall. He doesn’t have very chunky legs and it longer and this still has a good seal. It stretches well so I think it would be ok on a baby with chunkier legs. Dries fast also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome swim diaper!
reviews.reviewText: Love this reusable swim diaper for my son. No issues and it seems very comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for young swimmers
reviews.reviewText: Fits nicely and is an extra layer of protection over a swim diaper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If you have a chunky baby, size up
reviews.reviewText: My baby is 6 months and I signed him up for swimming classes where they required these. I originally ordered size 6-12 months but it was way too snug on my baby (he is 20lbs for reference). I ended up sizing up and the 12 month size fits great.They do stretch and are supposed to fit snug but if you have a chunky baby like myself definitely size up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: After years of trying different reusable swim diapers, these are the BEST!!!!!
Eine super Schwimmwindel, allerdings sehr klein. Unser Sohn (7kg) trägt die Größe XL (12-24 Monate).Anziehen kostet ganz bisschen Mühe, das Ausziehen ist aber sehr einfach
Super Passform, sehr bequem. Bündchen an den Beinen würde einen "Unfall" verhindern. Tolles Material
Leider war die schwimmwindel viel zu eng am Bauch. Mein kleiner hat auch keinen dicken Bauch, trotzdem war es zu spack. Die sollen ja auch fest sitzen, aber das war leider zu eng.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Leakproof , comfortable to wear , gives you confidence when taking toddler swimmingGood price pointWashes and dries well.Good price point

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall good purchaseOnly problem is size is bit smaller than age
